document.full_text: japan may ask domestic utilities to share the compensation costs stemming from the crippled fukushima nuclear plant and cap the burden on plant operator tokyo electric power  to $24-45 billion to save the company from financial ruin, a newspaper reported.
document.title: japan may ask utilities to chip in, limit tepco burden: report
